mapper.sql: id, project_id, host_id, port, server_name, create_time, update_time, del_flg, create_id, update_id
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) AS port_num from ( SELECT distinct t1.ip_long, t1.`port` FROM scan_port t1 JOIN scan_host t2 ON t2.ip_long = t1.ip_long AND t2.del_flg = 0 JOIN scan_project_host t3 ON t3.`host` = t2.domain AND t3.del_flg = 0 JOIN scan_project t4 ON t4.id = t3.project_id AND t4.del_flg = 0 WHERE t1.del_flg = 0
and t4.user_id = #{userId} ) t

select
'企业' as tag_name, t1.company as tag, t1.company as tag_value
'主域名' as tag_name, t1.parent_domain as tag, t1.parent_domain as tag_value
'子域名' as tag_name, t1.domain as tag, t1.domain as tag_value
'ip' as tag_name, t1.ip as tag, t1.ip as tag_value
'端口' as tag_name, concat(t4.ip,':',t4.PORT) as tag, concat(t4.ip,':',t4.PORT) as tag_value
from scan_host t1 LEFT JOIN scan_project_host t2 ON t2.`host` = t1.domain AND t2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN scan_project t3 ON t3.id = t2.project_id AND t3.del_flg = 0
join scan_port t4 on t4.ip_long = t1.ip_long and t4.del_flg = 0
join scan_project t5 on t5.id = t3.id and t5.del_flg = 0
where t1.del_flg = 0
and t5.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t1.company is not null
and t1.is_domain = 1
and t1.is_domain = 1 and t1.is_major = 0
and t1.ip_long != 0
group by
t5.id
t1.company
t1.parent_domain
t1.domain
t1.ip_long
t4.ip_long,t4.port

select
count(distinct t1.company)
count(distinct t1.parent_domain)
count(distinct t1.domain)
count(distinct t1.ip_long)
count(distinct t4.ip_long,t4.port)
from scan_host t1 LEFT JOIN scan_project_host t2 ON t2.`host` = t1.domain AND t2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN scan_project t3 ON t3.id = t2.project_id AND t3.del_flg = 0
join scan_port t4 on t4.ip_long = t1.ip_long and t4.del_flg = 0
join scan_project t5 on t5.id = t3.id and t5.del_flg = 0
where t1.del_flg = 0
and t5.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t1.company is not null and t1.company != '-'
and t1.is_major = 0
and t1.ip_long != 0
